images.copyright: Taj Mahal in Agra, Uttar Pradesh, India (© Tanarch/Getty Images)
images.title: Grand gesture of love
images.caption: Taj Mahal, Agra, Uttar Pradesh, India
images.desc: Let's explore the Taj Mahal, on the banks of the Yamuna River in Agra, Uttar Pradesh, India. This ivory-white marble mausoleum was commissioned in 1631 by Shah Jahan, the fifth Mughal emperor, to honor his late wife, Mumtaz Mahal. It is one of the New Seven Wonders of the World.

tooltips.walle: This image is not available to download as wallpaper.
tooltips.walls: Download this image. Use of this image is restricted to wallpaper only.
